dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2771314J] Pornographic Site

To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Monday, January 29, 2007 9:34 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2771314J] Pornographic Site

Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
I have been in contact with Michael Sullivan who is the Deputy Bureau Chief of the
High Tech Crimes Bureau from the office of the attorney general in Illinois.  He has
determined that your company, The Planet, is the hosting site for pornography linked
to our students. Google in the name "Audrey Van Acker" including the quotes.  You
will access a link entitled: 
LAURA VASS:  Most actual news about Laura san giacomo and Laura bowden....laura vass
Caitlin Whitson, Laura Zborowski. and so on --
nickparsonsltd.com/laura/Laura-vass.html-17k
When you click on this link, hard core pornography appears.  Please remove this
immediately.  Email me back so I know it's been taken off the internet. 
Thank you.
